titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation for publishing the peace between His Majesty and the French king
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh by the heirs and sucessors [sic] of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: "Tho. Cantuar. J. Sommers, C. Sunderland, Dorset. Romney, Oxford."
"Given at the court at Whitehall the eighteen day of October, 1697. In the ninth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
